description: Machinima is the most notorious purveyor and cultivator of fandom and gamer culture.   This channel features current popular content such as BFFs, Super Best Friends Play, Christopher Walkenthrough, along with classics like Gamepoop, Arby"n" the Chief, Sanity Not Included, and more.   BFFs is an animated comedy series by Hank and Jed Movie Pictures, about players in an online multiplayer world that must cope with having the world's worst noob as a teammate.  Super Best Friends Play brings together best friends Matt, Pat, and Woolie, who all share a passion for playing video games and having a good time.    Walkenthrough is a video game based show, revolving around the immersions of Christopher Walken, Morgan Freeman, Barack Obama, Donald Trump, and more.   Gamerpoop, by Mans1ay3r is a skillful re-editing of conversations and random encounters in video games for hilarious results! Featuring edits of games such as Mass Effect 3, The Witcher 3, Skyrim, The Walking Dead, and more.
name: Machinima
